headline: Stelo Adds Enhanced Smart Meal Logging Features as Dexcom Continues to Transform Personal Glucose Management
summary: SAN DIEGO, February 04, 2026--Dexcom, Inc. (Nasdaq:DXCM), the global leader in glucose biosensing, announced it will roll out an advanced AI-enabled enhancement to Stelo that will transform how users understand their glucose health and take steps in achieving their long-term health goals. The newest features will launch nationwide in the coming weeks.

content.title: Stelo Adds Enhanced Smart Meal Logging Features as Dexcom Continues to Transform Personal Glucose Management

thumbnail.caption: Enhanced Smart Food Logging experience now provides nutritional breakdown of meals
